attributes.action: Prohibit gambling-like games popular on Mobile devices.
attributes.background: Prohibit gambling-like games that are often popular with children and young people under 18. These games are being used to promote online purchase of virtual products by Children.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "gambling-like games".

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the types of games you would like banned. For example, if you would like a ban on games that use loot boxes you could start a petition about that.
